id: Judges urged to make complaint system more transparent
paragraph: By Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographerUpdated 6:55 PM ET, Tue October 30, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)A procession of legal experts and law students on Tuesday urged judicial leaders to bring more transparency to their system for handling misconduct in federal courthouses to protect employees and inform the public about the depth of the problem.
